---
title: from_bdrhap_to_h5mu
---

Convert the output of a BD Rhapsody WTA pipeline to a MuData h5 file.


## Argument help

Run the following command to view the module's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/convert/from_bdrhap_to_h5mu/main.nf --help
```

### Inputs



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name      |Description                           |Attributes                           |
|:---------|:-------------------------------------|:------------------------------------|
|`--id`    |A sample ID.                          |string, required, example: "my_id"   |
|`--input` |The output of a BD Rhapsody workflow. |file, required, example: "input_dir" |
:::

### Outputs



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name       |Description       |Attributes                             |
|:----------|:-----------------|:--------------------------------------|
|`--output` |Output h5mu file. |file, required, example: "output.h5mu" |
:::
